channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large 40cm pothole next to previous repair, 24th February
item.description:
Near the zebra crossing on oakleigh park north / netherlands road, nearest house is 111 Chandos Ave N20 9EG but the pohole is on netherlands road on the north side of the crossing (going towards 118 Netherlands Rd EN5 1BX) This has been there over a month. Other potholes on the south side of the zebra crossing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 114, Netherlands Road, East Barnet, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress on path .. been stood up multiple times to clear path, 24th February

item.title: Tarmac Roller left in dangerous position, 24th February
item.description:
A tarmac roller was left here during Kate evening /early morning. It is an obstruction to people trying to use the road. A lorry tried to turn this morning and came right over my drive to get around the roller

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lincoln Road, North End, Greater London
